sourcesContent:
Card title

This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This card has even longer content than the first to show that equal height action.

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-listofbooks', templateUrl: './listofbooks.component.html', styleUrls: ['./listofbooks.component.css'] }) export class ListofbooksComponent { }
